problem_text_cn: 如图,∠AOB=20°,点M、N分别是边OA、OB上的定点,点P、Q分别是边OB、OA上的动点,记∠MPQ=α,∠PQN=β,当MP+PQ+QN最小时,则β-α的值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, ∠AOB = N_0, points M and N are fixed points on edges OA and OB, respectively, and points P and Q are moving points on edges OB and OA, respectively, mark ∠MPQ = α, ∠PQN = β, when MP + PQ + QN is the smallest, then the value of β-α is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,作M关于OB的对称点M′,N关于OA的对称点N′,连接M′N′交OA于Q,交OB于P,则MP+PQ+QN最小,∴∠OPM=∠OPM′=∠NPQ,∠OQP=∠AQN′=∠AQN,∴∠QPN=\frac{1}{2}(180°-α)=∠AOB+∠MQP=20°+\frac{1}{2}(180°-β),∴180°-α=40°+(180°-β),∴β-α=40°,故选:C．
